title: Google\Cloud\BigQuery\Connection\V1\AwsCrossAccountRole
name: AwsCrossAccountRole
description:
Authentication method for Amazon Web Services (AWS) that uses Google owned AWS IAM user's access key to assume into customer's AWS IAM Role.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.bigquery.connection.v1.AwsCrossAccountRole

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.iam_role_id
params.description: The user’s AWS IAM Role that trusts the Google-owned AWS IAM user Connection.

params.name: data.iam_user_id
params.description: Output only. Google-owned AWS IAM User for a Connection.

params.name: data.external_id
params.description: Output only. A Google-generated id for representing Connection’s identity in AWS. External Id is also used for preventing the Confused Deputy Problem. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/id_roles_create_for-user_externalid.html

methods.description:
